about_the_game:
On a strange night, Axel Zakon, a former police detective and now Private Detective, is specifically requested by the police to aid them in the investigation of a homicide, with some unknown and mysterious reason behind this request.



Justice Seeker is a detective narrative game that combines interactive gameplay with a big plot-twisting narrative in this fully voiced experience. Find clues, investigate scenes and interrogate suspects as you solve the murder of the CEO of the most famous data analysis company in the city, TechDB. Will this be a simple case, or will it unfold into something greater?



- A dark, mysterious story with some narrative twists: will you discover what secret connects you to the victim’s death?
- A realistic story told by a great cast of characters that help shape the tone of the story.
- Freely explore TechDB from one floor to the other in search of clues to point you to the correct path. A detective’s job is never done: return to previous rooms you have inspected at any time if you previously missed some cue. You might even find new information.
- Use your detective’s skills to close-up analyze objects, take pictures of notable things to keep your information updated, interrogate different characters, from family members to other TechDB workers, and get the real culprit arrested.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains Mild Gore and Blood.

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon R7 Graphics
